Long Description

Job SummaryAs a Junior Product & Packaging Designer - Accessories, you will be responsible for supporting the Product Design Manager and Accessories Buyers in developing product & packaging design concepts.•    Work closely with the Product Design Manager to execute the seasonal design & colour direction.
•    Support the Accessories Buyers in developing new products and updating existing portfolio with new design concepts.
•    Designing new packaging concepts
•    Ensuring supplier implementation of Packaging Designs
•    Handling daily edits and changes to artwork, graphics and sketches
•    Produce good quality mock up visuals for each project.
•    Producing user friendly guidelines and manuals. 
•    Develops and updates project presentations & moodboards as required
•    Work closely with suppliers & China office team to ensure understanding of design concepts
•    Monitoring of design samples & design approvals 
•    Keeping up to date with latest colour & design trends at a local & global level
•    Travel as required (store visits, market visits, site meetings).
 •    Ability to manage multiple projects requiring organization, time management, and problem-solving skills. 
•    Ability to work under guidance and supervision. 
•    Basic skills in Adobe Illustrator, Photoshop and In Design, software programs
•    Excellent organization skills with attention to detail and follow-up
•    Flexible with the ability to self-manage and handle multiple priorities
•    1-2 years of experience in this field prefered. 
•    Good communication and influencing skills. 
•    Creative thinking. 
•    Quality focused and results-driven. 
•    Team-oriented attitude, attention to detail, and ability to meet deadlines.
